name: Yohan Room
description:
Yohan Room

Venture as Yohan, your classic and brave medieval fantasy adventurer, as he attempts to escape The Room. Grind your way to become strong enough to escape

My solo entry for the first indie tales game jam. I used pico-8 as the engine.

Controls

arrows - selections

Z key - action

Controls may change depending on the system you are using

---------------------

Even though I had a lot of fun and re-learned a lot of stuff, the features in this game are still incomplete. Worry not, I plan to and will (not) update the game in a near future.

please do not trust the commentaries present in the code (if you can get to them somehow), I was so sleepy at one point that little that I typed made any sense.

Took me ~10 hours or so to program it

I wasn't counting actually, tho it was one nighttime-after-beach-sunday-coding session

known issues:

-battle doesn't work properly (or at all)

-enemies somehow take hitkills and do not attack, what lazy bums!

Features:
-You can actually finish the game
